basics.name: Wazen Shbair (Dr. -Ing.)
basics.label: Senior Blockchain Architect
basics.summary: Senior Research and Development expert with PhD degree in Computer Science. A Full stack developer with advance experiences in developing prototypes and Proof-of-Concepts.

highlights: Leads the technical development of POC projects.
Supervise and Support PhD students in research and prototypes development

work.company: French National Centre for Scientific Research (CNRS), France
highlights: Study real-time identification of HTTPS services.
Study the quality of experiences of advertisements
Courses: Programming with C, Data communication, Engineering management, Embedded system, UML, Data structures, Information management, Parallel programming

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: XRPL Grant (6 months)
awards.summary: Develop a platform for smart contract development using Visual programming languages

awards.title: Full PhD Scholarship (36 months)
awards.summary: Study PhD degree on University of Lorraine, France
